definition: to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
to look down from a height/to spy on sth
bird's-eye view/see also 俯瞰圖|俯瞰图[fu3 kan4 tu2]

sentences.english: This is an aerial view of an ostrich farm near Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 這是平壤附近的一個鴕鳥農場的鳥瞰圖。

sentences.english: You might even try to draw your own map from a "birds-eye view" perspective.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以嘗試從“鳥瞰”的角度形成自己的地圖。

sentences.english: Taking the wheel of C5 Airscape is a total and continuous experience in driving pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 走碳五鳥瞰輪是在駕駛樂趣和持續的總經驗。

sentences.english: You may have a bird-eye view of the whole city there.
sentences.chinese: 那兒您可以鳥瞰全城的景色。

sentences.english: An aerial view of the oil leaked from the Deepwater Horizon wellhead.
sentences.chinese: 深水鑽油平臺漏油的一個鳥瞰畫面。

sentences.english: An aerial view shows Male, the capital city of the Maldive Islands in the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 鳥瞰圖顯示凸形的，首都馬爾代夫羣島在印度洋。

sentences.english: In this configuration, the performance of C5 Airscape is close to that of a four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 在這種配置中，碳五鳥瞰性能接近，一輛四輪驅動。

sentences.english: Google offers street views and satellite imagery of homes.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌提供街景鳥瞰和住家的衛星圖像。

sentences.english: The powerful design of the front and rear ends highlight the on-road stance of C5 Airscape .
sentences.chinese: 在前後兩端強大的設計上突出的碳五鳥瞰道路的立場。

sentences.english: From the top of Lianhua Moutain, you can have a bird's eye view of the CBD of Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 從蓮花山頂，你可以鳥瞰深圳中心商務區的全貌。

sentences.english: We had a great view of the Forbidden City from a roof-top bar.
sentences.chinese: 還有幸從一個屋頂酒吧鳥瞰紫禁城的全貌。

sentences.english: Climb to the top of Eiffel Tower if you want a bird's eye-view of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 如果想鳥瞰巴黎，你可登到埃菲爾塔頂上。

sentences.english: This image shows a simulated aerial view of her proposal for the Performing Arts Centre.
sentences.chinese: 這是模擬出的表演藝術中心鳥瞰圖。
鳥瞰維米，爪哇，印度尼西亞，1994。

sentences.english: Shall we go to the top floor of a bird 's-eye view from there .
sentences.chinese: 我們要不要到它的頂樓，鳥瞰一下風景呢？

sentences.english: An aerial view of some horses that will be herded during the annual roundup in Northern Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 一些將在冰島北部的年度綜合報告趕到馬鳥瞰圖。

definition: to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2
